attributes.action: removal of all politicians in northern ireland and replace them with highest ranked industry leader.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that all of the current politicians in northern Ireland should be removed and replaced with the highest ranking public servant or industry leader. minister for education should be a teacher/ lecturer and the health minister should be a high ranking doctor or nurse. these politicians cannot leave the past behind them. this will be to the detriment of the future of Northern Ireland. enough is enough. if you cannot be diplomatic you a guilty of dereliction of your parliamentary duties.
